data.title: Contact Information
data.hint: Either find or create the Contact Record for the user
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = ""

if Session("WizardContPersonId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"window.alert('Please find or create the Contact')" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"security/userProperties.asp?ContPersonId=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf
end if

data.title: User Information
data.hint: Enter the details for this User
data.script:
sBackJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/personProperties.asp?select=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=1'" & vbCrLf

If Session("WizardPersonId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"window.alert('Please find or create the User')" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"security/userSubscriptionsProperties.asp?Select=" & Session("WizardPersonId") & "&WizardStep=3'" & vbCrLf
end if

data.title: Access Rights
data.hint: Select which areas of the system the User can access
data.script:
sBackJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"security/userProperties.asp?select=" & Session("WizardPersonId") & "&WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf

sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"risk/sites.asp?ContPerson=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=4'" & vbCrLf

data.title: Delegate Responsibility - Sites
data.hint: Set the sites that the user has responsibility for
data.script:
sBackJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"security/userSubscriptionsProperties.asp?Select=" & Session("WizardPersonId") & "&WizardStep=3'" & vbCrLf

sNextJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"risk/entities.asp?ContPerson=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=5'" & vbCrLf

data.title: Delegate Responsibility - Entities
data.hint: Set the entities that the user has responsibility for
data.script:
sBackJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"risk/sites.asp?ContPerson=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=4'" & vbCrLf

sNextJavascript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"ibmail/ibMailProperties.asp?Person=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&CustomMessage=1&WizardStep=6'" & vbCrLf

data.title: Welcome eMail
data.hint: Send the User an eMail to welcome them to the system

data.title: Contact Information - Business
data.hint: Either find or create the Contact Record for the User's Business
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = ""

if Session("WizardContBusinessId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"window.alert('Please find or create the Contact Business')" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/businessPeople.asp?select=" & Session("WizardContBusinessId") & "&WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf
end if

data.title: Contact Information - Person
data.hint: Either find or create the Contact Record for the User
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/businessProperties.asp?select=" & Session("WizardContBusinessId") & "&WizardStep=1'" & vbCrLf

if Session("WizardContPersonId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"window.alert('Please find or create the Contact Person')" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"register/registrationProperties.asp?Business=" & Session("WizardContBusinessId") & _
"&Person=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=3'" & vbCrLf
end if

data.title: Registration
data.hint: Enter the details for the User's Registration
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/personProperties.asp?select=" & Session("WizardContPersonId") & "&WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf

if Session("WizardContPersonId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"window.alert('Please save the Registration')" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"register/subscriptionProperties.asp?registration=" & Session("WizardRegistrationId") & _
"&WizardStep=4'" & vbCrLf
end if

data.title: Subscription
data.hint: Choose the appropriate membership for the user
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"register/registrationProperties.asp.asp?select=" & Session("WizardRegistrationId") & "&WizardStep=3'" & vbCrLf

sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"register/registrationProperties.asp?select=" & Session("WizardRegistrationId") & _
"&WizardStep=5'" & vbCrLf

data.title: Contact Information - Business
data.hint: Either find or create the Contact Record for the User's Business. <BR>Note: This is optional for Trainees, unless you are intending to register the trainee.
data.script:
sBackJavaScript = ""

if Session("WizardContBusinessId") = "" Then
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/personProperties.asp?WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf
else
sNextJavaScript = _
"location.href='" & RootDirectoryOffset & _
"obms/businessPeople.asp?select=" & Session("WizardContBusinessId") & "&WizardStep=2'" & vbCrLf
end if
